attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public!
attributes.additional_details: Every year we see irresponsible people throwing fireworks at people numerous accidents due to negligence and stupidity, our animals suffer due to the them and the he fact people are strapping fireworks to animals and killing them. The minority of the UK general public cannot be trusted to use fireworks safely so should be sold for professional displays only.
attributes.background: I’m wanting the sale of fireworks to the general public banned and only to be sold for professional displays.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
